name: Beat Da Beat
description: Hurrican-like Bullet Hell. Avoid the rain of bullets to the rhythms of "dubstep". Help the hero to defeat the aliens and to take revenge on the interstellar aggressor!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core (Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Athlon X2 2.7 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
